changeset.author: Sergey Nikitin
changeset.query: MATCH (n:flow_event) WHERE apoc.convert.toInteger(n.timestamp) IS NULL WITH n LIMIT 10000 SET n.timestamp=apoc.date.fromISO8601(n.timestamp)

postcondition.query: OPTIONAL MATCH (n:flow_event) WHERE apoc.convert.toInteger(n.timestamp) IS NULL WITH n LIMIT 1 RETURN (n IS NOT NULL) AS result
